_header: Saint Matthew says in our gospel
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday after the Octave of Epiphany in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte mathewe sayse in oure gospellþat criste come donward of
                    a hill…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Als did vnthriue and Gyezie þat wex vnhale for his
                    gyllerie

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Matheu seiþ in vre gospelÞat crist com doun of an
                    hil…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As dide sum tyme Gyeȝiþat wox vn hol þorwh his
                    gileri
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum descendisset Ihesu de monte secute (f.
                    176rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu sais in oure gospellþat crist come donward of a
                    folle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Als did vnthryuand GyesieWherfore he felle in
                    meselry
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiia post octavam Epiphanie secundum Mathium (p.
                    65)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt mathew seyth in oure gospelÞat crist com doun of an
                    hil…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…as dide sum tyme Gieȝiþat wax vnhol þorw
                    Symony
CULDd11.Note:
Break between 4714 and 5223 occurs ten lines earlier in this
                    MS.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sant mathew says in oure gospellþat criste come dunward of a
                    hyll…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Als dyd vnthrewand geneȝyeþat were vn hall thurght
                    hys clergy
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
dominica tercia post octabas epiphanie Secundum Matheum (f.
                    39)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint mathew sais in our gospellThat cryste come dunwarde of
                    hell…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Als dyde vn thrywande geneȝyeThat wex vn haile thurgh
                    his clergy

EDCPCM.First Lines:
sayn matheu sais in our godspelleÞat crist com dunward of a
                    felle…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Als did vnthriuand grezieÞat wex unhale thoru his
                    giliþe
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica iia post octavam epiphanie secundum matheum (f.
                        31ra)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt mathew says in oure gospellþat criste com donwarde on a
                    hyll…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…als dyde vnthryuand ayeȝieþat wex lepor for fals
                    symony

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint mathew seyth in oure gospellAs crist come donward of a
                    fell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As dyd vnthryvand gyesyÞat was vnhole þrogh his
                    gylery
HunHM129.Note:
Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943 incorrectly gives f. 73; MS treats 5223, which follows, as if part
                    of same text.
